document.full_text: damage from last week's tornadoes and storms in jefferson county, alabama, which is awash in debt, is far worse than initially thought and will hit the county's sewer revenue, the county commission president said on tuesday.
document.title: alabama storms hit jefferson county finances
lines_and_colors: damage from last week's tornadoes and storms in jefferson county, alabama, which is awash in debt, is far worse than initially thought and will hit the county's sewer revenue, the county commission president said on tuesday.
